author: CBS News
title: Lupus patients struggle to get vital drug after Trump comments
description: Hydroxychloroquine has not been approved to treat coronavirus, and the nation's top infectious disease expert says there is no  evidence it is effective.
content: One of the drugs President Trump has touted as a potential "game changer" to treat COVID-19 is a vital medication for patients with lupus. However, the drug — hydroxychloroquine — has not been clinically tested or approved to treat coronavirus, and the nation… [+5640 chars]
